name: Isle Glow Face Moisturizer Sunscreen SPF 45 with Sea Moss and Niacinamide
about: What it is: A pearlescent, lightweight, and antioxidant-packed daily face sunscreen that gives skin an island glow and blends seamlessly on all skin tones...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Sea Moss: A nutrient-rich seaweed that strengthens the skin's moisture barrier..- Hydrating Nectar: CAY SKIN’s exclusive, plant-based nectar that replenishes moisture levels..- Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): A skin-loving vitamin that nourishes, visibly tones, and smooths skin...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This lightweight SPF has a unique glow-boosting nude pearl blend that applies faster and more seamlessly on all skin tones without leaving a white or silver cast. It is infused with vitamins and antioxidants, is silky smooth to apply, and protects skin from free radicals and blue light..
ingredients: -Sea Moss: A nutrient-rich seaweed that hydrates, supports, and helps protect skin..-Hydrating Nectar: CAY SKIN’s exclusive, plant-based nectar that replenishes moisture levels..-Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): A skin-loving vitamin that nourishes, visibly tones, and smooths skin....Avobenzone 3% Sunscreen, Octisalate 5% Sunscreen, Octocrylene 10% Sunscreen, Water, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Sodium Potassium Aluminum Silicate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Diisopropyl Adipate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Lauryl Lactate, Glycerin, Mica, Propanediol, Glyceryl Stearate, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Fruit Extract, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Ferulic Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Cetyl Phosphate, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Silica, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Chlorphenesin, Aminomethyl Propanol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Lactate, Sodium PCA, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Myroxylon Pereirae (Balsam Peru) Oil, Cupressus Sempervirens Leaf/Nut/Stem Oil, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil, Amyris Balsamifera Bark Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Limonium Gerberi Extract, Limonene, Linalool, Benzyl Benzoate, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides.....
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For daily use with or without makeup.-Apply to face 15 minutes before sun exposure. .-Reapply at least every two hours or after swimming or sweating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of thee best moisturizers. It’s not too overwhelming and it has a beautiful smell. For those of us with sensitive skin The Isle Glow Moisturizer is our Holy Grail. 10/10 please give it a try for yourself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this sunscreen! I especially love it in the winter as it gives me a bit of a glow after my summer tan has faded

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mine has turned into a cottage-cheese consistency and I can no longer pump it out. Also, The company sends free goodies that are about to expire as incentives - not a good move.   I really wanted to like this brand but this is the second item from this brand that has left me dissapointed. Their lip spf dried out my lips and I've confirmed it was this product because when I discontinued it's use, my lips went back to normal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful packaging, beautiful glow BUT BURNS MY EYES. It doesn’t burn immediately after applying, but it does burn throughout the day. I usually notice it about 30 mins after applying and it comes and goes all day… sad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The glow that this sunscreen has is unreal. BUT can give a very tan cast on dark skin. I thought I would be able to put it on and walk out the door but that was not the case.  I use the recommended amount of sunscreen to get full protection and that amount made it look as though I was wearing a mask. I tried to wear it under makeup but it just felt heavy and greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this product. It goes on smoothly, feels luxurious, and allows just enough glow through my it foundation, to look natural and healthy. In my opinion, nothing comes close. For anyone who doesn't understand the acronym, GOAT, it doesn't leave wiry hairs all over my face, but really is the Greatest Of All Time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This spf was definitely one I was reaching for during all my summer outings. It’s such a lightweight formula with a beautiful pearlescent finish. My skin has such a healthy glow with this. It’s the perfect last layer on your skin but also wears beautifully with makeup, giving a radiant look. It’s easy to blend out and does not leave any greasy or heavy feel. I’m happy that it looks so pretty on my brown skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a deluxe sample online and immediately went back to get the full size version. This face sunscreen is perfect! It is NOT GREASY and it DRIES. I hate my skin feeling tacky or greasy after most sunscreens, especially those that provide a glowy finish. This actually dries down, doesn't have a strong fragrance, doesn't burn my eyes, and has a beautiful finish. It also plays well with other makeup. I rarely write reviews and I rarely enjoy using sunscreen but this product is a game changer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hello! I just started trying out this product. The finish is super glowy and it is very light. I’m so glad it has sea moss because that will help my acne prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this product a few times and I really love it. It is quickly absorbed into my skin and it gives me a healthy glow. It has a beautiful finish and helps blur my imperfections

reviews.review_title: Caused a ton of blemishes overnight!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product made my skin super glowy, which was amazing, but two huge issues. First, I was at the pool and when my face got wet, this sunscreen BURNED the eyes - it was really bad. Second, the next day I woke up completely broken out everywhere on my face. I've never broken out so badly and I don't have sensitive skin. Unfortunately, won't be using again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sunscreen is amazing! It leaves your skin looking glowy and radiant. It’s not sticky, doesn’t smell, it simply just leaves your face looking like the perfect natural glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin

My skin feels hydrated and looks radiant. Perfect for my daily routine, it's now a must-have in my skincare arsenal. Highly recommend! 🌞✨ #CaySkin #SPF

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

This SPF from Cay Skin and being sun kissed, it’s really unmatched! 10/10 recommend and will definitely be keeping this in rotation! Because what’s better than glowy and protected skin?!

reviews.review_title: A must have! Worked beautifully under my makeup!

reviews.review_text: AMAZING! I absolutely loved this product. I love the glowy but not oily finish it gave me and it worked so well on my sensitive acne prone skin. I would highly recommend!

reviews.review_text: The pump doesn’t work at all and no product came out. I pried the container open to transfer the product to a new container and it didn’t event have a straw attached to it.

reviews.review_title: Looking for glowy radiant skin? She’s your GIRL!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was actually shocked about this product. I’ve been using it for a couple of days and I’m living the results. It does not peel for my girlies who wear makeup, and it does not break you out for my girlies with sensitive skin. It’s super glowy and radiant and it doesn’t have a weird scent! 9/10 for me the pump needs work but it works really great match it up with the sunscreen lip balm from Cay skin!!! Trust me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: By far the most lightweight spf moisturize I’ve ever tried! And my absolute new obsession here’s why: - I have eczema (many skincare ingredients trigger it) this one doesn’t make me flare up. This is huge for me!!!!  - My skin is super dry, so hydrating moisturizer is a NEED for me. This Isle Glow is so hydrating and lightweight. It’s a perfect combo for hot summer days when you want the hydration but you don’t want thick heavy products sitting on your skin while you’re sweating away!! And it doesn’t look greasy at all! Gives a perfect glow ✨ - I’m brown so dealing with white cast is a thing for me. The tint on this product is just the right color, no white cast just a perfect blend of color to enhance my skin tone. Overall I’m in LOVE!!

reviews.review_title: Perfect everyday sunscreen!!! UV and Blue ligh
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely Love This Sunscreen! This sunscreen has a natural finish and a radiant glow. The SPF 45 offers great protection. It’s infused with sea moss, hydrating nectar, niacinamide, and a nude pearl blend. Provides UV and Blue Light protection, is silicone-free, vegan, and safe for my sensitive skin. It’s the perfect everyday sunscreen.

I would definitely recommend for my acne prone people too there were no breakouts on sight just that glow✨🫧

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes I received this product to review, however I had already purchased a trial size with my points. So this is genuinely my opinion. I took this with me on my vacation to Hawaii and didn’t experience any burning on my face. This with their sunscreen balm make a perfect no makeup dewy look. This has a strong glow factor so if that’s not your thing maybe looking for something more matte but I think the flower the more hydrated the better. Has excellent skincare ingredients as well which I love because it makes it better than any old sunscreen. Had a very sheer tint to help cancel out MILD redness but I still used concealer for my dark circles. I love this product. The packaging is great. One thing to note, you may have to tap it upside down when first getting it or you may think you have a faulty pump but   Definitely recommend, especially for dry skin girlies out there.

reviews.review_text: i've been using this formula for quite awhile but i have the old bottle they used when they first launched this product, idk why they changed the bottles because the old packaging works fine.. i did read the reviews about the pump being horrible but i was hoping the issue was fixed. i just received my order the other day and mine won't pump anything out at all, i've tried getting it out and nothing will come out so i now have to drive an hour to town to return it and hope there's some in store.the formula's great and gives you that perfect lit within natural glow but just beware you might get a defective bottle, many people are experiencing issues with the pumps!

The only negative is the pump as I feel like I have to frequently push the product down by tapping it on the bathroom counter a few times. I also have to pull the pump out as it gets stuck. Overall a juice product.

reviews.review_title: Perfect protection in a beautiful formula

reviews.review_title: Love it, sits beautifully under makeup

I got a mini of it which was in a squeeze tube so I can’t speak to faulty packaging. All I know is that it looks so good under my makeup and my skin loves it. It sits better than super goop, the elf sunscreen, even my beauty sunscreen. I really enjoy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am perplexed by this brand. The first version of this sunscreen was weird in consistency, and the pump did not work (I had to completely trash one soon after buying it because it was stuck). I gave it a try with this second version of the sunscreen, as they redesigned the formulation AND the pump. The product is lovely, but the new pump does not work either! Get it together, Cay people.  I feel ripped off because now I have a full bottle (again) that gets stuck and won't deliver the product. Although I love the product itself, I gave it two chances, and now I won't buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this but it’s only okay. The bottle is cheap and the pump often gets stuck, I hate that you can’t see how much product is inside.  The formula is nice and the iridescence is a nice touch. I like that the ingredients are clean and it doesn’t irritate my skin. But I didn’t love it.

reviews.review_title: 5 star product but the pump is a let down
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

Sets great over time.  Will purchase again but please change that pump design. Both of ours didn't work, literally had to knock that pump on the counter!  Eventually some product came out.  Not a great design when you need to use daily before work and for the price.  Great job on the product Cay!
J’utilise ce produit depuis cet été à tout les jours et je ne pourrais plus m’en passer. Nul besoin de plus d’une pompe pour courir le visage au complet. Donne un beau glow a la peau.

reviews.review_title: Not the worst but still not good or worth it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the type of product with shimmer in it that gives a fake “glow”. It provides a slight temporary tan appearance to my light skin. This settles into my mouth lines which I absolutely hate, so this is a definite no for me. Skincare products should not make skin look worse but that’s exactly what this does. If you want to look like an early 2000’s mess, this product is for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blends really well and adds a nice glow to the skin. I find it works much better than other mineral makeup I've used as I don't have to use makeup to cover up a blue cast. I've actually received 2 compliments after only 3 uses (one on an cloudy day and one on a very sunny day at the park).  This has become a staple for me.This blends really well and adds a nice glow to the skin. I find it works much better than other mineral makeup I've used as I don't have to use makeup after to cover up a blue cast. I've actually received 2 compliments after only 3 uses (one on an cloudy day and one on a very sunny day at the park).  This has become a staple for me.  You do need to pump it 20+ times on the first use, but it works well afterwards.

reviews.review_title: So far so good! Pump needs a lil extra work tho
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like using this as a last step in my AM skincare routine as a spf/moisturizer hybrid. I do a couple pumps with a pump of GR dew drops - my skin feels hydrated and looks super glowy! Plus there’s a very sheer tint that evens out the skin tone. Loving it so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Peels, burns my eyes, clings to dry patches, is drying to the skin. Unflattering “glow.” I definitely hate it because I love Winnie and I always want to support black business. Unfortunately it’s a no for me

reviews.review_title: Works well for me. I love it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this moisturizer. I got a sample of it in one of my Sephora orders and gave it a whirl and I'm back to buy the full-size bottle. It's so light, my skin absorbs it well. Doesn't get weird with primer or makeup and my skin is noticeably smoother and my complexion has improved in a short amount of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burns my eyes so bad. I washed it off and they are still burning. I am very fair and the “tint” is basically nothing. It’s too sheer and light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So unfortunate that I did want to give this a try and it turned out to be an ultimate fail. It is not “black girl” or darkskin friendly because the “glow” is giving white cast…. unfortunately

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: This sunscreen blends very well into my medium tan (Fenty 320) skin. The color of the sunscreen was undetectable after a minimal level of blending. Also, there is definitely a glow to the skin when using this. But...  Cons: The glow looks like I've applied highlighter all over my face. It's not a dewy glow like I'd prefer. It's less noticeable from across the room, but when I look in the mirror, there's a noticeable artificial shimmer on my skin. There's also a very strong classic sunscreen smell that's fine for body products but that I'd prefer not to have on my face. I can also feel the product on my face during the day. It doesn't feel irritating per se, but it feels like something I don't usually wear is there, which I try to avoid.  If you like the glow, this is probably a great product for you. If you're not a shimmer person, maybe pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I give this product 2 stars because it does blend ok into the skin and does not pill. However, it does not blend completely into my deep brown skin. This spf moisturizer has a light tan tint with pearlized shimmer. So on me the tint is way too light when it first goes on but eventually blends in about 75% of the way. Which okay is not horrible but not great. What really causes me to rate this product lower is the pearl shimmer which comes off as micro silver glitter on my skin. I end up looking like I put a silver makeup product all over my face in a bad way. I recommend this product if you are going to put foundation over it. But do not buy this if you want to use it on its own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It took forever to pump some product out and the bottle looked cheap. The product was okay but too glittery. I won’t be repurchasing or recommending.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m seriously so grossed out by this product. It separates so weirdly and doesn’t sit well on the skin. I should’ve taken a picture of it on my skin all separated and gross but I forgot and I already threw it out. norecommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s okayyy, but I found the glitters to be very sheer. I liked the body lotion more.

reviews.review_title: New addition to my summer routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a nice lightweight glowy sunscreen. I barely feel it in my skin and it doesn't get greasy throughout the day. It wears nicely with make up, I haven't had any issues with pilling. It does take forever to pump out when you first use it but that's a pretty minor issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this specifically for the spf factor, however!!! This is will be my new favourite moisturizer this year hands down. I have combination/rosacea skin so I need a constant balance of moisture, spf, and products that are gentle but powerful. This is it! ITS GIVING GLOW. Does not irritate my sensitive skin, and my complexion is loving the pearlescent tint. Gives my skin life, looks fresh and healthy. My bare face has never looked better! I generally don’t love a glowy look but this compliments my skin so well. Haven’t tried it under makeup yet as it might push me over the edge and start looking ‘shiny’ on my combo skin, but this will be a staple in my collection for summer and winter. (Yes, you will think the pump is broken when you first get it, but pump it at least 20-30x on first use to get the product going). Worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This sunscreen makes my face looks so glowey and tan! I was skeptical at first (as I am of most sunscreen that claims to give a glow) so I did a side by side with regular sunscreen and I noticed a  difference. I will say that it does peel quite a bit which may be difficult for people with texture issues
Was extremely excited to test out this product however it's defective! Nothing pumps out! This is simply ridiculous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Initially assumed product was defective as it took minutes to pump out product. When I eventually did and rubbed it into my face it left a gold cast. I kept rubbing it in but it left my skin looking olive green. Not meant for the dark skin girlies it seems.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is better than the Supergoop one. It’s shimmery but very natural looking. Light weight. Packaging is kinda cheap though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed! I use this daily and my skin looks healthy and glowing

reviews.review_title: Nice, Just a Bit Too Glowy for Me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the sunscreen, but the glow is a little too much for me. Under makeup it’s perfect, but on its own, I usually mix it with another sunscreen to tone down the shine a little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the texture of the product as it went on nicely and didn’t make my skin oily. Will definitely be something I use frequently during the summer months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how lightweight this product feels on my face. It isn't sticky or oily on the skin. If anything, it dries almost matte with shimmer, no powder needed! Perfect for my oily skin in the warmer seasons. I love to maintain a tan all summer, and I feel like this product is going to be my go-to everyday spf.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While I think this product sits on the skin beautiful and gives such a healthy glow, I don’t think it’s for all people… I’m VERY pale (paler than the model in the photos), and have quite red undertones. I find that this leaves a slight  olive/tan tint to my skin that is noticeable to me. I’m sure it would be fine under some makeup, but I normally go makeup free. It also has a weird smell to it- kind of smokey in my opinion. I won’t be repurchasing but I think it has potential for most people!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It took me several attempts to get the pump to work but once it did and I used the product I really liked the consistency of the moisturizer. Most of my skin is oily but I liked that it do not leave my skin greasy or sticky. I’ve added to my daily face routine and so far I am really liking it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just started using this product & find it’s my daily go-to for sun protection (it’s SPF 45) and moisture. My skin is normal, but seasonally dry & this moisturizer gave instant hydration without feeling heavy or looking oily. I have heard really great things about niacinamide & am excited to see long term results. I would definitely recommend as my face looks healthy and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a really great option for a tinted glow sunscreen. I have tried my fair share of glow sunscreens and have often felt overwhelmed by them since I have oily skin - they usually just emphasize my oily-ness and leave me feeling insecure and needed powder. This is the first glow sunscreen where I feel I do not need to apply powder after - which is amazing since I like to wear this when I am active outside and needing that breathable skin feeling! 10/10 recommend. This is worth the investment. Will be using this through the spring and summer months ahead!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this product thru Sephora’s promotions. While it applied nice, I never wore a sunscreen that bothered my eyes this bad before. I like to have sunscreen around my eyes and then add powder to set it. Will not use again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this with one of my orders. When i first used it, it blended like butter on my face and gave such a nice plumpy dewy finish. LOVED IT. Fast forward to a week later it started  separating on my face. I thght something was wrong with my face that day. Tried it again the next day and it happened again when i put a little drop on my hand to see, it immediately separated and became all clumpy. I was gonna go for the full size but thankfully i waited and now i wont

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Huge fan of this sunscreen ! Gives such a nice little glow while protecting your skin from the sun while aaalsoo moisturizing the skin with the sea moss and niacinamide. I have oilier skin and this sunscreen stayed on well without making me look super greasy by the end of the day. I love the idea of the pump so theres no contamination of the product, and just love the package aesthetics overall. Docked down a bit only because when it starts to melt down a bit, it got in my eyes I could not stop tearing up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For $34 and I could not get the product out. After Pumping the product for  few minutes nothing came out. Was obvious that something was wrong. In pure frustration, I was able to take the top apart and guess what...no tube connectef to Pump product out! I'm now left with this sunscreen that will dry out. Loved the sample. Will make due with what I have but will scratch Cay Skin off my list of skincare items.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It gives a beautiful glow and is perfect for my dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always looking for quality SPF moisturizers for my face that don't clog my pores or leave my skin feeling greasy. This takes the cake! It adds a super subtle shimmer which I LOVE. I was only able to see the shimmer in the sun -so it's not overly shimmery/shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product in the morning and it left a nice glow on my face. I didnt notice the sunscreen smell that much once it sat on my face. I love that this product has sea moss and niacinamide. Im going to continue this in my daily routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i got a mini as a sample or whatever and i used it, does anyone know why it's watery and like the tan is in clumps? is it expired

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A perfect travel sized SPF moisturizer! I absolutely love the glow it gives me and the smell just reminds me pool/beach vibes. I will be definitely be wearing this 24/7 on my next vacation :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yall this is s MUST HAVE. This is the first time I have tired this product and I am blown away, I like it because it is light weight and leave me with a glowy finish.  It has SEAMOSS which is a plus, you can wear it with or without makeup. This is for sure in my makeup routine now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There are so many reasons why I love this lotion with SPF:   - The formula is really light, and the tint eliminates any chance of a white cast found in many other sunscreens. - The sun coverage of SPF 45 is higher than other lightweight moisturizers. - It is scented, but only a little. It's not overpowering and it smells earthy, but nice. - My skin literally glowed after application - sweet! - Fairly affordable for the quality of the product. - It contains sea moss, which really hydrates the skin. - The formula dried down quickly, with no greasy film.  I just loved it so much and will get a lot of use of it this summer. Would 100% recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This SPF is perfect for the summer!! I love how glowy and hydrating it is. I am a huge sea moss lover so I was super excited to use it in my skincare routine. This will be my go-to for the beach.

reviews.review_title: Definitely recommend giving it a try
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Used this at the beach and it added the perfect glow that didn’t make my face too oily. Will definitely continue using!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a dog walker, so sunscreen is super important to me! This is so pretty on, I was ready to love it. The eye stinging/burning others mention is pretty extreme. I can shrug off a brief little sting. This is persistent and intense, especially after a few hours when it started migrating into my eyes more.

reviews.review_title: Perfect Combo of Protection and Moisture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A perfect combo of spf, shimmer, and hydration. As spring rolls around and I spend more time outside I’m so glad I found this to use under my makeup. A little goes a long way too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really like the glow this sunscreen gives me! And love that it is SPF 45 and has great ingredients such as Niacinamide. The only issue I had with this is a day I wore it outside while sweating a lot. Some got into my eyes and it burned (which is an issue I have with most chemical sunscreens). Also my bottle pump was a little broken and it took me a few things to get it pumping correctly. Otherwise loved it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always hesitant to try new sunscreen products. But let me tell you, I have never tried a more perfect-tinted SPF in my life. The consistency is so nice and thin,  not like most SPF lotions out there. She melts into the skin and provides you with this instant GLOW! I ended up putting some powder on top to tone down the dew a bit, but she is everything I could have hoped for in a tinted SPF. Can't wait to get more from this collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this because it covers like a tinted moisturizer, it has sea moss which is a fantastic ingredient. Also love that it is not super expensive so I feel comfortable being able to recommend this to my friends and family :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this sunscreen! It goes on glowy without looking or feeling oily. It’s also super lightweight which is always nice while in the sun or under makeup. Definitely a new staple in my skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love that it has sea moss. This is super light weight and doesn’t feel sticky or thick. This gives me a glow that doesn’t look oily which is great because I already have oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really great moisturizer that I think would work with a lot of different skintones and concerns. The ingredients are great. I can clearly see an improvement even after just a few weeks and my skin is clearer and brighter and a lot more hydrated. This is a steal for the price and I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite sunscreen I have found. It goes on so smooth and makes my skin glow!! I love the ingredients, and would 10/10 recommend it to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying to find a moisturizer that gives me a glow and is also a sunscreen without making it feel that I have a film on my face. I love that it also has sea moss and niacinamide in the ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The glow that this gives from the pearl is like a Sunkissed goddess. All I have to do is put on some mascara and I'm ready to go.  It also has to many good benefits packed into its cute packaging, such as sea moss (hydrate & help skin barrier), niacinamide (tone & smooth), uv & blue light protection, and helps to replenish moisture. I love this product and will be using this as part of my daily routine.

reviews.review_title: I am absolutely in love with it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's summertime! I take it with me anywhere, but it looks the most pleasant at the ocean beach! Just look at the picture! If I take it with me on a trip - it means I LOVE IT!  First of all, the moisturizer has a really light and non-greasy feel, which is awesome. It soaks right into my skin without leaving any sticky residue. It also leaves my skin feeling hydrated and soft throughout the day. And let's not forget the SPF 45 - it's a lifesaver!  One of the best things about this moisturizer is that it includes sea moss and niacinamide in the formula. The sea moss is super nourishing for the skin with tons of vitamins and minerals. It keeps my skin looking bright and healthy while providing antioxidant protection. Niacinamide helps to even out my skin tone, minimize pores, and diminish fine lines and wrinkles. Talk about a power duo!  I would totally recommend this moisturizer to any of my friends who are looking for a daily SPF that won't break the bank. The quality of this product is seriously amazing for the price.  All in all, I'm really happy with my experience using it. I can see myself using this product for a long time to come.

reviews.review_title: Perfect addition to your Spring skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, LOVE this sunscreen. As a Black woman with a darker complexion, I am always skeptical about trying new sunscreens. This sunscreen totally hit the mark!!! Not only does it not leave a white cast and is easy to apply, it is also really moisturizing (thank you, Niacinamide!). I think it'll be a perfect hydrating SPF moisturizer for the spring and summer. Don't get me started on the GLOW, hunny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was really interesting because I thought it would be really shimmery but it ended up being super glowy and blended well with my skin. I used it with an extra moisturizer because I have dry skin and it worked great! Also, putting makeup on top of this product made me look extra dewy and radiant! Love this product

reviews.review_title: A Staple For My Skincare Routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using cay skin products and this one is by far my favorite product. I love how it easily blends in and has a smooth feel on the hands, and on my skin. I suffer with dry patches on my face but the sea moss has been very helpful with keeping my face hydrated. It's a perfect balance of keeping my skin hydrated and protected from the sun daily. So happy that Cay Skin made this affordable. I get to be outside this summer with my skin looking all glowy and protected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this glowy sunscreen! I love applying at as my base in spring/summer. Gives the perfect glow while protecting my skin at the same time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After seeing this product come out from Winnie Harlow's new skincare line, I knew I wanted to give it a try. I am SO GLAD I decided to get this Isle Glow Face Moisturizer because it is so lightweight and gives me the cutest glow whether or not I'm wearing makeup. The tinted formula actually blends into my skin so flawlessly and the pearlescent finish is everything!! This is definitely my new favorite sunscreen for my everyday skincare routine because I also love the fact that it has sea moss and niacinamide in it to keep my skin healthy + protected <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this sunscreen as my daily sunscreen for a week now. It has the most amazing glow to it! Whenever I wear it I layer cream makeup products on my face and I look like a glow goddess for the whole day. I use about two finger length worth of product and I haven't experienced any white cast or irritation. I will be adding this to my everyday routine because I really love the slight glow it gives me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is not every day that I run across an SPF that I can wear with and without makeup and doesn’t leave a white cast! Cay Skin knew what they were doing with this one, and the Sea Moss is a nice refreshing touch! I was also happy that I didn’t break the bank with this one even with how beautifully packaged it is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this moisture doesn’t break me out, I have sensitive skin. I also love the natural glow that it gives my skin. It’s made with natural high quality ingredients, sea moss and niacinamide.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sunscreen is amazing! The light consistency is really comfortable on my skin, absorbing rather quickly. It gives me a moisturized and healthy glow, my skin doesn’t look shiny or greasy. This is perfect for days when I’m looking for that extra glow and on no makeup makeup days. Having ingredients like sea moss and niacinamide, my skin feels plump and deeply hydrated. I love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging, i love how the product itself doesn't feel heavy on the face. It blends in smoothly. This should be a part of your summer essentials.

reviews.review_title: I love this SPF for my dry sensitive skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle to find products that I love for my dry, redness prone, sensitive skin. The ingredients in this SPF are amazing from the Sea Moss, Niacinamide, and Pathenol to help calm and moisturize my skin. Bonus that’s it’s an SPF 45. I use it in place of my moisturizer in the mornings and it works great for skin prep for makeup as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, works well with my skin. Definitely gives me that glow I’ve been looking for :)

reviews.review_title: Amazing glow with NO WHITE CAST!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light weight is a big factor I look for in SPF. Smell is also a factor and this has a very faint smell, I love that! I was really impressed with this one because of exactly that. It was not heavy on my skin and left NO WHITE CAST! It left a simple glow, I was really happy with. As I am getting older, Ingredients like Niacinamide have help with my skin care routine! I am happy to add this to my everyday morning skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used  this moisturizer (with spf 45) multiple days to test it out throughly and leave my honest review. For reference, I have combination skin. What I liked about it: feels lightweight, leaves skin looking hydrated and glowy without feeling greasy (I only apply 1 pump), no white cast (it has a slight tint to it that blended nicely into my tanned complexion), and the “clean” ingredients (Sea Moss that hydrates skin, Plant-based hydrating Nectar to restore moisture levels, and Niacinamide that tones, and smooths skin). What I didn’t enjoy: the scent (I have a sensitive nose and prefer unscented products), and sometimes it pilled. Other than that, I would recommend this to anyone looking for a glowy moisturizer! But, don’t rely on only this product to fully cover your spf requirement (applying 2 fingers worth for full protection on face) cause it will look way too much and glittery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a new staple in my summer routine. It is a great spf for the summer and will keep your skin glowing too. I recommend to buy this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product, I was worried it would make me look ashy because of the glitter but once you work it in it disappears.  I use on top of moisturizer because it isn’t enough to hydrate my dry skin - I wish I was more dewy dewyhygiene

reviews.review_title: A must have for the summer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cay skin is a really nice face SPF that I will be using all summer long. I love the packaging that it comes in because it is easy to use and I love that you can just pump it out right on your face or hands. The sunscreen itself dose not smell a lot like sunscreen, which is something I prefer and the best part is my face feels soft. It doesn't leave my skin sticky or oily. I have started telling my friends about this product just so we can get it before it sells out!! I also love that there is Sea Moss and Niacin amide in the SPF. Just another reason to get it and pretty affordable for something that is such good quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just recently tried this product, and I was really impressed. The formula is really creamy and it melted right into my face. I love the natural glow it gives me. It makes me feel like I'm freshly tanned from being in Hawaii. I throw a little bronzer and highlighter on top and it finishes off my natural look. This is a product I've already recommended to a few people because I have received several compliments on the glow that it gives. I love that the ingredients are clean.
