reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I initially loved this product and was convinced I would repurchase it. However, not long after I bought it (maybe two months), it separated. I tried shaking it but it was no use. Utter waste of money.

reviews.review_title: Don't Waste Your Money - Separated Formula
reviews.review_text: The product was great for the first month, then suddenly the product formula began to split into oil and pigment. Shaking it did not help and now it is completely unwearable, which is unfortunate because I didn't even make it halfway through the product. Save yourself the time and money and just get something else.
Love this stuff! Its so beautiful on the skin!! I found out about it from my sister. I couldn't stop staring at her glowing skin and asked what she was wearing and this was it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used points to purchase the trial size of this product and loved it. My skin had a nice glow and it gave me a no makeup look when going to the beach. By day 3 of wearing it I decided I would get the full size. I have combination skin and put on Sephora’s hylauronic moisturizer some days and some days did not and it didn’t make a difference I was never dried out by it. I’m dark skin and gave some to my medium skinned friend and we both had a nice natural glow.   I read a couple other reviews and I think you trade the white cast of SPF for a slight shimmer with this product. I am always looking for a SPF that doesn’t look like I’ve just slathered mayonnaise all over myself and this made me look good and protected me. A good point to remember that SPF is temporary and you must reapply- SPF 45 means you are only protected for 45 mins so as far as reapplying went I was never super shiny or greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m impressed by this product. I’m fair skinned and love how this gives my skin a subtle glow and evens out my skin tone, with a natural finish. It doesn’t take much at all, I use about the amount of a pencil eraser. eraser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was awful. The pump stopped working and the consistency was not good. The product came separated and was not good for applying on face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is for Black or Brown people because if you are lighter than brown, this will end up being way too bronzy and make you look like a shiny penny. This is also for people who simply want a glow and don't care about sun protection because if you use the adequate amount of this product to actually be protected, you will again, look like a greasy shiny penny. This would look nice on the collar bone area or as a light layer when you're on vacation. Overall, does not work for me and I don't think it's practical but would totally be a hit for people who just want to look bronzy on a warm day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Outstanding product! My only issue is that the tint really does not work well on my fair skin; I have to dilute it with another moisturizer to get it to blend enough. Other than that, love this product & brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this. I have oily skin so my face is never ever dry. This dried me out immediately. My entire face is tight and peeling.

reviews.review_title: Break me out every single time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only noticed a reaction to two products in my life. First was an Olehenriksen serum, second is this sunscreen. I noticed small bumps all over my face after the two times I used this and decided to give it another go. Again, my entire face is covered in tiny bumps and feels a sting when I use skincare products afterwards. I immediately tossed the product in the trash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and fell in love.  perfect glow, not greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just tried my sample & love it. My face is glowing & feels smooth.  Came to order full size and sadly it’s out of stock.  I can’t wait until it’s back in stock.

reviews.review_title: Found my new favorite glowy sunscreen!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this included as a sample in one of my recent purchases and I'm impressed! I noticed it was tinted and I typically don't like tinted sunscreen but this leaves such a beautiful finish. It probably has to be the most lightweight suncreen I've used, I feel like I have nothing on. It gives me a radiant, lit from within glow. I prefer this Super Goop's glow screen. Highly reccomend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible ￼ ingredients. It’s a chemical based sunscreen and it’s too heavy. Pass

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If i could have given this 0 stars I would have.. I got the 100 pts rewards trial size and absolutely loved it! It gave the perfect glow and felt amazing. To my horror, when I bought full size it was a completely different experience. The product is AWFULLY separated and when you pump it out instead of finding a smooth lotion, you get a pool of oil in your hands.. Honestly, this product needs serious reformulation. I highly doubt that a product with such a uniformity issue is actually delivering the SPF 45 it’s claiming on the label. I received the product with lot code 1349. It just sucks because I wanted to love this product so badly but sadly it did not deliver..

reviews.review_title: Amazing Subtle Glow, Baby Spit Up Smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product, the glow is just a neutral tint with liquid highlighter mixed in. It's not large flecks of glitter or anything like that, it's very inconspicuous and subtle. THE SMELL THOUGH. It smells like baby spit up. If you've ever been spit up on by a baby, you know exactly what I mean. I gag anytime I put it on and IMMEDIATELY douse myself in perfume. If you can stomach the smell then 10000% buy it. Maybe get a sample or try in store first!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly only purchased this after seeing Winnie Harlow discuss it on the Drew Barrymore Show earlier this year. I was excited about it, at 1st, I enjoyed it because of the glow, however, this product separates horribly. I have used many facial lotions over the years and this one, unfortunately, even with the bottle still mostly full, I may throw it out because even after shaking it up, it's still separated and seems useless or less effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this!! I have olive & dry/combo skin and the moisturizer felt very smooth on application and gave me a nice glow, even underneath my concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really loved this mixing it with a moisturizer for a slight glow in the summer. However it did start separating and becoming really oily. Not sure if something happened to my bottle or what?￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample size in a kit. I simply can’t recommend this, and if you have sensitive skin just avoid it. This caused me to breakout. Like an idiot, I used it again just to be sure this was it, and I regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do not understand the high reviews on this.   First use was fine… leaves a sparkle on your face that is kinda fun in the summer months but then it almost went bad. It’s curdled and oily. Made me break out and I just hate it. Would not recommend

reviews.review_title: There are better sunscreens out there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using it with different skincare layered underneath, and have not had the best results. For a product claiming to be aimed toward oily skin, it doesn’t set whatsoever. There are a lot of very fine fglitters in it which my skin found irritating and because it doesn’t set it slides and finds its way into my eyes, causing irritation. I would love this type of flow for the body and am interested in the body formula, but this is a no for me for the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is gifted by Cay Skin and my first time using their products and I have to say, it’s one of my favorite spf moisturizers! I love the way it feels on my skin and it doesn’t irritate it (I normally have very sensitive skin)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wore this all summer. I liked the glow and loved the sun protection. Also, it wears well under foundation which is sometimes hard to find in a moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sephora, you need to curate your SPF? What skin respecting brand would put BERGAMOT OIL in an SPF, especially with marketing geared toward a more melasma prone demographic. I’m honestly shocked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has pigments of sparkles (which does make you glow) I imagine that’s not ideal for sensitive skin though. I think this feature should be more clear. It does moisturize and absorb well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product as 100pt sample. I loved it after the first use, such a great glow. After I purchased the full size I was horribly disappointed seeing how poorly the formula separated and even after shaking it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and I really like it. Some people said it's glittery but not on my skin, it's ethereal like the charolette tilbury highlighter. Makes skin look healthy and the texture doesn't pill later or under makeup. I have oily skin, fyi

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horribly oily. Separates so badly- comes out part mouse mostly oil. Once on the skin it really emphasizes texture. And glitter specs in it - very very sparkly. Honestly not a good product at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the sunscreen all summer. Loved it. It left me feeling dewy and was a great addition to my routine. The formula could be improved but the product is amazing

reviews.review_title: where have you been all my life?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily t zone skin and tend to be too pink in the face, with very fair and super sensitive skin—I have an autoimmune disorder that effects my skin greatly so it’s difficult to find products that work/do their job, stay on, and dont irritate my skin. I love looking tan, and have been enchanted with Sally Hanson clear tanning spray for legs, and adding drops of Sol to moisturizer to get that beach look this summer since too much time in the sun aggregates my condition. Got this sample, and it’s my new favorite, exactly what I’ve been searching for all my life! I’ve tried so many products over the years, and this one honestly is the singular formula I’ve found that makes my skin just its best self—I actually feel comfortable and confident not wearing any face makeup after using this! Still pop on mascara and eyebrow pencil since I’m super blonde and look like a baked potato otherwise! Very highly recommended, worth every penny! Will be buying the big bottle when I run out! Leopard print pic is just moisturizer, grey shirt is foundation etc on top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used 100 points to get this product off Sephora rewards,They claim this is a product for people with oily skin, but the product looks greasy the whole time wearing it. It has sparkles which shouldn't be in a tinted moisturizer, feels like paste and the coverage is patchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this using rewards and am so happy I did. This is an immediate hit for me. It's a whipped texture and goes on beautiful, blends in and zero white cast. I keep reaching for it and will buy the full size as soon as I'm out of the sample size. Made my skin so beautiful and glowy all day. Absolute gem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product separates horribly I doubt you are achieving the stated SPF. The few pumps that were perfectly blended were decent. Please fix the formulation, your sunscreen is not something that should separate so significantly, especially in a pump bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product when I first applied it, it gives a lovely glow and goes on really nicely, a little goes a long way. The downside I didn’t like was the unpleasant taste, and while I was careful to keep it away from my mouth every time I used it I had a bitter unpleasant taste in my mouth. I’ve read other reviews that mention it transferring easily and so that must be the issue. The other downside, also mentioned in other reviews is that it separates in the bottle and unless you shake it very vigorously you just end up pumping a thin liquid rather than the creamy product it should be. I had to return my first purchase because once it had separated in the bottle I couldn’t get it to mix up again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It just gives you a pearlescent dewy golden hour type of glow that I live for! I personally don’t notice any type of glitter on my face like others are saying it also doesn’t come off of my skin it stays on and sinks in. I feel like if you have darker / brown skin and can’t use products like Glowscreen (that makes me look terribly pale despite certain people claiming it’s a “holy grail”) then I’d advise purchasing this. Every single product that Winnie has came out with I have fell in love with and works well for my skin❤️.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm biracial with combo skin, and my face has never reacted well to anything with chemical or natural SPF in it. Every product with a SPF never fails to give me clogged pores, which sucks as someone in their 30s hyper-conscious of sun exposure. Whatever is in this stuff is a godsend for me. Have been wearing it daily for three weeks now with no issues which is unbelievable for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: YUCK! Way too oily , and comes out the bottle with the product separating. So now I have a pool of oil in my hand and some of the sunscreen barely hanging on. Dries down to a weird glittery look on your face. Hard pass especially for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: received as one of my samples and am in love. buying a full size before the tiny bottle i have runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my skin so radiant and healthy, absorbs well. I bought it after I’ve tried a sample, I literally fell in love with it from the first try. I usually hate all spf that I try, but this one is just perfect not only as a sunscreen but also as a light makeup if you feel lazy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love a glowy sunscreen but there’s just too much glitter for me. It feels greasy on my skin and comes off too easily..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have mixed feelings about this product (acne-prone skin type).   On one hand, there is glitter in here and I find that the glitter comes off when I touch my face throughout the day (I do touch my face a lot so it is noticeable when the glitter gets on my hand). If I set my face with some powder and a setting spray, it does last long and glitter doesn’t tend to wipe off. I also find that this product needs to be shaken super well to mix for the best wear. This is something that can be overcome, but I would recommend unscrewing the pump and stirring the product with it before using for the first time because the more this product mixes together, the less noticeable the glitter is.   On the other hand, I do love the way this wears on my face. It looks super glowy and there is no white cast from this product so it would look great on all skin tones. I don’t have any problems with this affecting my moisture barrier and my acne doesn’t react to this product at all.   If this is a product that interests you and is something you would wear everyday, I would recommend it. However, do be aware it may take some trial and error to get this to perform at it’s best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gorgeous looking spf for deeper skin tones. I have oily skin and it’s not overly shiny. It leaves a pearlescent glow  you can wear on its own or beneath makeup ro five You a glowy base. The texture is like mouse. You need to give it time to set like all spf.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a little sample of this product and honestly didn’t have high hopes for it. BUT it actually looks pretty good on my skin, it s not heavy or oily. The texture is very light and it s very easy to spread just a few drops (which is enough) all over my face. Plus it has a very subtle tinting tone that perfectly blends in with my skin color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super glittery & comes off so easy. I have really dry skin, but even I looked oily wearing this. It blends in really well which was nice, but started to peel off throughout the day and looked like I had clumps of things on my face. Would not recommend it or buy again. I won’t even be finishing my first bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Just one pump on the back of my hand was enough for me to know it will be going back to the store! It contains visible tiny pieces of glitter all over it, under sunlight it looks like a night club of sparkles. Definitely not the glow I was expecting to achieve from this product. Also, it’s heavily fragranced. Sadly, it’s a pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this SPF. The pearlescent effect is so nice and natural. Doesn’t make you loose greasy at all just a light dew. I got a sample a while ago and it was that curdled texture that everyone hated. I ddnt mind it it still worked very well. The bottle I purchased texture is smooth. The herbal scent is less but still works the exact snow. Very happy with this. Blends into the skin like it was never any colour to it.  (Top swatch is the sample from a month ago Bottom is the bottle from this week)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gives such a pretty glow and a slight “tint” that neutralizes my skin. I use “tint” lightly because I don’t think it actually has any color, but I do feel like it covers my redness slightly. The shimmer isn’t noticeably on the skin, but hands are always very shimmery after applying. 4 stars and not 5 because it does separate. The product still looks and feels good, but I’m not sure if the separation impacts the sunscreen properties. I have been using a deluxe size from the summer sunscreen kits. I would buy the full size and plan to when I finish my other sunscreens.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited for this product but it disappointed. The cream and oil separated and no amount of shaking would fix that. I loved the packaging and the sun protection, and, of course, the glow was gorgeous, but I couldn’t get past the texture, which started to break me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the glow it gives. But the product splits. I’ve started shaking the bottle before applying but it hasn’t revived it fully. Also the color transfers. But it’s super light in feel and I’m happy with it. I am black and have darker skin tone, this blends really well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get pilling when I use any serum and honestly anything under this sunscreen which is really unfortunate since the glow it gives is gorgeous. This makes it unusable for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with this brand and can’t get over how beautiful this glow is! It’s the best product to use under make up and alone on days you just want to look radiant and natural! LOVE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. It gives a beautiful glow that’s not greasy, and blends well under makeup. This product is very similar to Supergoop Glow Screen but soo much better! Love the texture and lightweight feel, also a bonus that there is Niacinamide, and clean ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Some of the reviews really surprise me. First off, this isn’t advertised as providing light or medium coverage like a foundation would. It’s a moisturizer with SPF that gives skin a slight glow, so you don’t have the usual white cast that you get with spf moisturizers. It is very beautiful on the skin. I have not noticed any pilling and it absorbs fairly quickly; it doesn’t transfer especially if you’re applying appropriately by patting into the skin. I don’t have great skin (acne scars) but this leaves my skin glowing and healthy looking. My skin looks every so slightly sun kissed. I’m obsessed with it!

reviews.review_title: subtle glow and doesn’t break me out!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got the sephora sunscreen kit and brought the trial size of this sunscreen with me on vacation. I loved the way this sunscreen preformed, considering it was 95 degree weather and humid where I was vacationing! My skin gets a sunburn rather quickly and even with the UV index being 11, my skin did not burn. I loved the glow this sunscreen gave my skin, gave a “your skin but better look”. Didn’t need to wear any face makeup but I still looked put together! Will be purchasing the full size! Plus this didn’t break me out!

reviews.review_title: This is not for people with Sensitive Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This broke me out. It gave me a glow followed by random acne on my cheeks. Returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was reluctant to try this product, because nearly all of the positive reviews were incentivized.  Additionally, the reviews that weren’t incentivized were not so great.   I decided to take a chance & purchase anyway since my current sunscreen was way too greasy & caused me to breakout mid day.  I am so glad I followed my instincts and purchased anyway. This product is AMAZING! There was no pilling, greasiness, or glitter everywhere as some reviewers stated.  I thoroughly shook the bottle before dispensing, then rubbed two pumps between my palms before applying to my face. The application will look shiny for maybe a minute tops, but dissipates shortly after leaving behind a great natural glow.  I have sensitive acne prone skin and this sunscreen did not burn or cause any breakouts. I will definitely purchase again when I finish this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way my skin looks after using this. I’m not impressed with how the product comes out from the bottle. Even after shaking, the product seems like it’s separating from an oil when you apply it. You look bronzed with glass skin after you apply it tho.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It is clumpy when you get it out of the bottle like other people said, but I don’t have too many issues blending it. My problem is I’m on the paler side and it turns me orange. I love the idea of the product and I wish it worked for me but my neck is a few shades lighter than my face when I put this on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a trial of this and was severely underwhelmed and honestly a little disgusted. The smell was really unpleasant and the product itself was an oily, clumpy, glittery mess that did not blend well at all and made my skin a hot mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely HATE the smell of this wish it came fragrance free or just smelled like normal sun screen

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This did not work for me. Upon initial application I really liked the way it looked, but it never dried down and ended up being a royal mess. Way too sticky and the shimmer gets on everything. Glad it was just a travel size included in the sunscreen bundle and not a full size purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good glow, but this was WAY too glowy and not natural looking. it made me feel greasy and never really sunk into my skin. the yellowy tint would rub off on anything that touched my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this originally as part of the summer sunscreen deal earlier this year. When I used it, I was in love! I was trying to stretch out the mini size that I had, but my 7 year old son used it all up! When I asked him why he used it all up, he said “Mom! It makes my skin look amazing!“ Well, I could not argue with that! He is much fairer than I am, but it looked amazing on both of us! He has no idea that I am going to hide my full size bottle so I can keep it to myself! It is perfect for those days when you don’t want to wear make up or just want to get a few extra minutes of sleep and skip putting on make up. I like that it is SPF 45 because mini sunscreens are only SPF 30. Excellent deal! I did not have trouble with transferring or stinging if I began to sweat. I hope to see more from this line!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this spf moisturizer because it doesn’t give a white cast. It’s a great underlayer for makeup or wearing as-is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you like glitter stuck in your pores you will LOVE this. Returned this because of all the glitter particles

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the look and feel of this, but if I am dry it does get a little cakey and the pump on the bottle died halfway through use.   It gives a great natural glow everyone compliments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually use Super Goop Glow Screen and when I received this sample I really like it much better.  It has higher SPF and feels much less sticky on my face.  It also does not sting when I sweat like the Glow Screen.  I ordered the full size.  It's great for summer with a very slight tint which works well under my 1 shade darker summer foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only used this product once so far and it’s safe to say I’m in love. The glow it gives is so nice and just makes you look healthy. I will say my only tip is to shake it well before pumping it out because it does separate a little in the bottle. Definitely a must buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I reeeally wanted to like this :( it gives a nice glow, but the texture was weird on my face. It didn’t nicely sink in, and it would crease/collect under my eyes (which I usually don’t have a problem with). It also broke me out, so sadly I had to return!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this because it’s a 2 in 1 for me. I usually use Chanel or Tom Ford luminesce over sunscreen but with this is one and done. I have dry skin and exfoliate regularly. This is perfect. It gives me a glow with spf but I don’t look like I’m going to a rave, I just look healthy. I’ve had ZERO problems with it splitting or pilling. My new favorite.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful glow but it’s not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had never heard of this brand so I was curious to try it. I liked it a lot (you will know why I don’t give it more stars below) PROS: - Slightly tinted: it looks so beautiful on the skin. But it doesn’t provide any coverage. - It has a pearly iridescent glow: it leaves the skin looking so glowy, but not greasy. - Good ingredients, including antioxidants and niacinamide. - Clean at Sephora  - Chemical sunscreen: doesn’t leave a white cast but may be irritating to some (not to me, but I don’t apply it around my eyes just in case) - Good spf level (45) - It got absorbed quite well, even applying liberally as it should. It left a glowy finish that May be too much for oily skin. - It worked perfectly under my makeup, helping to show a glow from within. Even used by itself looks beautiful. CONS - It has a slight scent. It smells good in my opinion but, as some people are sensitive to essential oils, they should make the products without them.  - It is not transfer free, so if you touch your face, you will see the product on your fingers and it can transfer to your clothes. - It has bergamot oil that can be a photosensitizer and that’s why I give just three stars. I have melasma and I don’t want it to get even worse because of an unnecessary ingredient on the list. Cay Skin, please remove that ingredient, because the sunscreen is gorgeous!  I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product due to it being black owned. But it really separates on the face throughout the day. I tried using this product six different times to make sure that I made an accurate assessment. However to no avail every time I go out I feel the product coming off my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing spf with a beautiful glow. It’s great alone as well as under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really want to love this product. I love the way it looks on the skin, I love the protection and ingredients. Only downside is it is doesn’t set at all, if you touch your cheek it will be on your fingers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do like the product and it gives a glow to my skin. I just don’t like the separation of the SPF and the pearl iridescent, and it can cause pilling on the skin.

reviews.review_title: I'm Glowing, It's a YES for me...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: PROS: Lightweight, Luminosity lasts all day, doesn't make my face greasy (I naturally have oily skin), blends well onto my skin, my makeup looks great on top (some separation around my nose which is my t-zone).   Cons: Does pill  Overall, I REALLY like this product! I was in love with the MILK MAKEUP LUMINOUS BLUR STIC, and this product gives me that luminous glow with the added benefits of moisture and SPF 45. I love the packaging as well; it's minimalistic and chic at the same time IMO. The pilling occurred after I directly applied the ILIA C Beyond Triple Serum SPF40. You need to let the CAY Sunscreen settle for a few minutes before directly applying your makeup or other products. Stipple and bounce your product on top-instead of rubbing motions. I use this product as the last step to my daytime skincare regimen. As for the clumps-I warm up one full pump between my fingers and then press onto my skin, then I'll smooth it out. The Sephora representative was hating and trying to steer me away from purchasing this, but boy am I glad I didn't listen to him and the reviews. Not every product will work for everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the idea of it, I liked that the smell was not super potent like other sunscreens, however, regardless of how much I shake it to try to mix it, it separates so badly from the second I pump it out. Very separated and I try to blend it but have a hard time. I am not sure if I just got a bad batch, but it appears other people have the problem too?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this for a little over a week. I get it now... This is not your typical daily sunscreen in my opinion, and if you are expecting it to be that, you will be disappointed.   Consistency: If you do not shake it, and I mean shake it vigorously for like a solid minute, then it will be chunky gold flecks and oil. And even after you shake it well it will be a bit chunky but it will dispense more blended than if not shaken.   Color: I am a light brown complexion; think Sanaa Lathan. And this is beautiful on my skin. It adds a healthy glow. Not too shiny, and not glittery. Obviously I cannot say what this looks like on other complexions, but if you are similar to mine this should look beautiful on you.   Quality: This does not pill on me. With or without makeup on top, I have not experienced that at all. If you are oily, you will likely be oily by the end of the day with this on. Reapplying was not an issue and I did feel it protected me well against the sun when I wore it outside.  All in all this is the sunscreen you wear if you want to be seen. You wear this if you want to look extra good, show off a bit, either naturally, or in addition to makeup. A day date, brunch, day party, rooftop , etc., this is the sunscreen you wear. This is not sunscreen you wear to go hiking. Would it protect you, yes, but there are more options that require a bit less maintenance. This is a special occasion sunscreen. I love it and will continue to use it as that AND plan on buying the body version when it drops =)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i feel conflicted about this one. it looks really nice but it’s a little hard to spread and if i use any other skincare with it, it pills. still working out the best way to use it. i like that it adds a little color tho because my face is usually paler than my body.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used up the one that came in the Sephora Sun Safety set. Overall I like the mousse texture. The sunscreen smell is not overpowering and it does rub in nicely. I wear moisturizer underneath and do not wear base makeup - and I had no issues with pilling.  This is quite glowy though so if you are very oily I would probably skip this one. Additionally, if you are very fair, this may look way too bronze. I found that if I am in a sunny place and I need to reapply, the color sort of adds up over time and you end up looking extremely tan/bronzed, which would not be a good look if you are very fair—you will probably end up looking orange. But this is a good option for medium skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a Deluxe Sample of Isle Glow face moisturizer and I was impressed.  It left me with a dewy glow that was very hydrating.  I didn’t notice much color from the tint, even though I have fair skin, and the sparkle was nice, and not super obvious.  The fact that it is a sunscreen is an added bonus!  Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_title: Worst sunscreen I have ever tried.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible sunscreen. I bought this to check it out, because of the buzz and also because I like to try different sunscreens. If you think mineral sunscreens are horrible, then you have not tried this yet. This sunscreen peels so badly and the texture is mousse, however, it does not sink in and stays on your face like a thick foundation. On top of that, it really stings your eyes. The bottle itself was cheaply made, because the letters and descriptions Faded away only after 2 days. Horrible quality and I am returning this product for sure. 45mL for this price and the quality is unacceptable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly wouldn’t repurchase again. Made me look like a yellow glitter ball. And it Gets all Over my newborn. Wouldn’t repurchase again. As well the first pump you apply it always looks weird

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gives me the perfect glow. Very light and smooth. This is not a foundation and don't expect it to work as such.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s okaaayy, defiantly not my fav, does leave your skin with a very pretty glow, but when first pumping it out it almost looks expired, it’s all separated until you rub your hands together, it does tend to pull over my moisturizer which I don’t love at all. 2 stars for the pretty glow will not be a re-purchase.

reviews.review_title: irritated my skin, chemicals took the print off
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ugh. This is my first negative review ever on Sephora. I just don’t understand this product. It looks like it should be a tinted moisturizer, but on your face there’s nothing more than a sheer sparkle. I also don’t have sensitive skin, but within seconds of applying, I get a burning/itching feeling. It’s got to be from some strong chemical ingredients as the product on my fingers removed some of the print on the bottle. (Paint remover?!) Hoping to return

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sunscreen is perfect! Applying it over moisturizer, it rubs on so nicely onto the skin and leaves a glowy look. It doesn’t pill either! This is great for a no makeup day. I see some people saying the smell is bad or off, but it smells fine to me. It feels so nice and smooth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love! Doesn't pill under makeup. Leaves my skin so glowy and hydrating. Love this for my no makeup days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample size of this as part of the Sephora sunscreen discovery set. It adds a nice glow to the skin, but it pilled pretty badly on me. I do use moisturizer under my sunscreen, but it's not very emollient and I don't apply any foundation/base products on top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have no idea why Winnie Harlow  and her team “developed” this product because it brings nothing new, and actually something very low-quality to existing sunscreen options.  The sunscreen itself is composed of chemical sunscreens Avobenzone, Oxytosilate (sp?), etc. that are known eye and skin allergens. And then it’s packed with cheap perfume agents Limonene, Geraniol et al. The “island glow” is a little bit of mica and spray on tanner. Honestly, I can buy products of equal or better quality and performance at my local drugstore for a 3rd of the price and BOGO. I’m disappointed, and I have no idea why this brand would choose to lead their launch with a product that is so poorly formulated and mediocre.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wear this most days and really like it. It feels light, I like the smell. Sometimes it's glowier than I want to be (i.e. at work), but usually I put a bit of powder over it and I'm good. Lip gloss is great, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you actually apply the appropriate amount of product for SPF protection, you’re gonna look yellow, greasy and textured. You’re gonna be a cheese pizza.  It’ll aesthetically work better if you’re using a small amount to give your skin glow. But then what’s the point of using this as sunscreen? Returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this sunscreen. I have tan neutral skin tone and it gives me the perfect glow. It is light weight, I put it on immediately after moisturizer and I experience no pilling. I have found with most sunscreens that pill, I can prevent it by moisturizing before hand. I will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first pumped out some product I gotta admit I was nervous. Let’s say I’m above 60. My skin is good. But ya know age is age. So anything remotely shimmery can be dicey. This product makes my skin look creamy. Soft. Smooth. I just love it. Even out my tone too. Plus I was in the sun working and no red! I typically tan anyway but first real spring outing.  Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is genuinely one of the WORST sunscreens i’ve ever had the displeasure of using. it pills, it is definitely not for all skin tones, and the quality is simply unfortunately bad. very happy i didn’t have to pay for this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Returned this product. It separates even if you shake it up, which makes for blotchy coverage. It did not feel good on my skin and did break me out a little. I was really hoping for a nice smooth coverage SPF but this one is not it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Much more natural looking that supergoop glow screen, very light and feels amazing on the skin. Definitely much better than I had expected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this in one of my orders and was so excited to try it out! I loved the ingredients and the high SPF count plus I’m always on the hunt for a great sunscreen and moisturizer combination. Unfortunately this did not fit the bill and I’m glad I had a sample before buying the full size. The white cast is out of this world and even blending it fully to the point of “creating wrinkles,” didn’t really smooth it out. The white cast was most prominent on my forehead and probably wouldn’t be a big deal to most who go in with foundation but usually at work, i go for the “no makeup, makeup” look and feel and with my dark skin tone, it was just too noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s super oily on skin, separates while blending, and kinda has an off smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and was excited since I like the lip balm. I have oily/combo skin and agree with others that this sunscreen has a very greasy look on oilier skin types! The real kicker was how it migrated into my eyes and burned and stung all day long (I was at work and couldn’t wash it off). It didn’t irritate my skin so that’s a plus, but for those with sensitive eyes - watch out! I applied the same way I do all other sunscreens (I recommend supergoop, kinship, and biore UV if you can find it).

reviews.review_title: Greasy and wouldn't go into skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My mom got this and it's the worst product EVER. One star is too much but it's the lowest I could go. This comes out already separated, my mom is a light/medium combo skin and it just moved around on her face, it wouldn't go in. It turned her face orange and then it pilled all over her face. It was greasy and generally yucky. None of her foundations worked on top of it, it just separated and pilled.  If you have really DRY skin, you might like it but if you have OILY/COMBO skin, I would run away from this product. I don't get how this has a 96% success rate with people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product is light, goes on smoothly and gives me a great glow. Be carful not to use to much at once over small area. Took me some practice but figured out the application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is fantastic! I love how glowy it makes my skin look. I am super dry and this is so hydrating and feels amazing on my skin! 10 out of 10 for sure!

reviews.review_title: NOPE! one star is too much.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot with this. This isn’t sunscreen, it’s more like glitter bronzer foundation that makes every little flaw on your face look pronounced! It pills & just feels unnatural on your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wear SPF to protect me from the sun. No other reason. However, it’s nice when it can give a nice glow or double as a make up primer. Since I wear SPF to protect me from the sun I wear the recommended amount. And holy crap that much of this product is way too much. It leaves me looking like a bronzed statue with a yellow hue. It also emphasizes pores and texture. So basically this is a product that provides glow that happens to have SPF in it. In the same way a foundation would have SPF but there’s no way you could use as your primary sunscreen. And I don’t care to be mixing all sorts of Sunscreen. I hated it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product works great for me. Goes on smoothly and perfect. This is my new favorite!!!! Amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this product as part of Sephora’s Sun Safety Kit. The product appeared to be completely separated, even after shaking. I’m not sure if this is just a bad batch or if the product is just formulated this way. Even after rubbing the product in, it left my skin with a yellow hue and the mica transferred to everything it touched. Very disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This made my skin look like I'd rubbed a too dark for me highlighter all over my face. It emphasizes every pore, fine and wrinkles I didn't even know I had.  It was nicely moisturizing and didn't take too much to sink into the skin but it just made my skin look older and dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, with certain other skincare products this will pill. Buy once I figured that out, it's been nothing but love! And I usually hate shimmer in all over face products! I don't know how they did it, but it looks really dewy dumpling good on my medium skin tone. I feel like the shimmer is less intense and a lot finer than the shimmer in the Tula yellow bottle one. I don't notice any strong smell and it sinks in easily. One thing to note is that I can't use concealer (Merit) alone over this because the finish is completely different and it will be very obvious, so I have to use either nothing after this or my concealer then powder over everything and set it with my Rare Beauty mist. It's really great for those rushed no-makeup mornings though. Love this so much that I just purchased their wildly expensive spf lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Separates on skin and also pills. Would not recommend. Also smells like sunscreen. It also makes me look greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product feels nice but doesn’t look even on the skin. For me, it looked like I was covered in gold and only looked decent in sunlight. In indoor lighting it looked muddy and clumpy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m sure it does the job it claims to do but it is absolutely not lightweight. I didn’t like how it felt once it dried. I felt like it could crease/crack when I used it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! It makes my skin glow and gives protection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: New holy grail, I am obsessed with sunscreen! Literally I purchase every single one and omg this one is my favorite! It’s soft glowy absorbs quickly and doesn’t pill!!!! Definitely will be repurchasing !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this sunscreen mini in my Sephora Favorites sun safety bag, and was hesitant to use it because I've never been a huge fan of Winnie Harlow (or Chantelle, as I remember her from America's Next Top Model). But weird celebrity endorsement aside, I really loved this sunscreen. Goes on super smooth, gives me a nice natural glow, doesn't pill, doesn't clog up my pores. I have medium / olive toned skin and it really glows up my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t like this sunscreen at all. I found it to be streaky, difficult to blend, and it pills. The texture is slightly moussy, and in my experience was really challenging to work with. I’m looking for a sunscreen with a simpler application. It also made me look way too warm-toned (e.g leaning orange). Pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked that this sunscreen wasn’t too thick and didn’t irritate my skin at all. The only thing I did notice was that it became a bit discolored when in the sun. Overall great product and has helped with my dark marks.  Gifted by Cay Skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this looking for a sunscreen different from my usual Colorescience and EltaMD and thought I'd give this a try. I loved the glow-y look and texture, but not the fragrance. Wore it out a couple of times on a sunny day and wondered why my skin was red at day's end. I checked the ingredients and discovered it had two citrus oils (bergamot & orange peel) in the ingredient list. Citrus oils can cause a reaction when exposed to sunlight, like a serious sunburn! My skin was red and itchy for days. Unfortunately, I can't recommend this sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! So beautiful on the skin, it gives you a very subtle, and natural glow without looking greasy. Amazing for no-makeup days or under your foundation. Comes out of the applicator funny but doesn’t affect the product. This product was gifted to me  by Cay skin**

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It is lightweight, absorbs quickly, doesn't have an unpleasant smell and best of all - adds a subtle beautiful glow!

reviews.review_title: Buy only if you enjoy breakouts.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the Sephora sun kit and this came in my bag. I was so excited to try a new sunscreen that promises a glowy finish. Unfortunately not only did it not give me a glow, it also broke me out badly.  I will never put this on my skin again, not worth the horrible breakout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sunscreen is awesome! Gives me a poreless finish without a white cast. I’m literally glowing without looking oily. I really love the feel of it on my skin too. It doesn’t feel heavy and is a great substitute for cc cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this Isle glow face lotion with spf 45 i received complimentary from Cay Skin. I love the beautiful pearlescent lightweight texture it absorbs well and gives my skin moisture and sun protection it needs.  It gives instant glow on my dull skin i love it. I use it every day in the morning after cleaning my skin with makeup. I will buy and recommend to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm loving it! I know how important wearing sunscreen is everyday but it has been so hard to find one that works well with my skin. With this one, I am impressed! I love the ingredients because I want to wear something that is working for my skin too. Going to keep trying it out! This was gifted by Cay Skin.

reviews.review_title: BEST SPF EVER!!!! natural everyday glow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried every sunscreen you can imagine and this one takes the cake!!! It has a light mousse-like texture that feels so silky upon application and doesn’t break me out like most sunscreens. The glow is GORGEOUS yet natural, and felt hydrating. definitely my new everyday sunscreen

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: CAY SKIN by Winnie Harlow just launch this amazing product which i have been using it for 3 weeks now and my skin looks more glowy and diminishing the blemish on my skin and best part after applying it no more oily looking skin or left out white residue. my skin has gotten so many compliments coz it looks radiant prefect for any season. And it is gifted by Cay Skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this new Isle Glow Face Lotion! I'll definitely be using it all summer long, especially on beach trips to keep my skin protected. The texture of the product is perfect and blends so easily! Gifted by Cay Skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was super excited about this product after being gifted by Cay Skin. It doesn’t have too much of fragrance, but a little bit of an old cardboard smell. The consistency is a bit strange… almost foamy? But then it applies super nicely and blends into the skin very easily. Love the glow and can always use more SPF!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This sunscreen has a nice, lotion feeling and leaves a beautiful glow. The glow level is on the edge of being a little too much to wear on its own, but looks really nice under a foundation or tinted moisturizer. I love the packaging and that it has a pump.  I will say that by the end of the day I felt it caused my foundation to look a little bit heavy, but it could have been then it didn’t fully agree with the foundation I was wearing.  If you plan on purchasing this sunscreen, definitely check out their spf lip balm. It felt super nice on the lips and it felt great knowing they were protected.  This was gifted to me by Cay Skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cay skin gifted me this spa and I'll be honest I absolutely love this spf. it gives me a glow while keeping my skin safe and secure. and personally I'll be recommending it to people based on the fact that most of us use should use this when we go on vacation. it's light and doesnt feel heavy either

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by cay skin. I absolutely love this product! I use this spf glow lotion as makeup and I’m obsessed. My skin looks gorgeous and dewy while also protecting my skin from the sun. I’ll definitely be using this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product is insanely amazing ive been using it for over a month and my skin is more glowy as well as my blemishes have diminished and my skin has gotten so many compliments usually consist of it looking radiant and is gifted by cay skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Cay Skin in exchange for a review; these are my honest thoughts.  PROS: - high SPF rating - lovely sheer glowy finish that can be used under makeup or as a natural liquid highlighter on top of makeup  CONS: - for some reason, this formula continually separates -- no matter how much I shake up the bottle or stir it with the pump, I can't seem to mix the formula together, so I'm left pumping out a mix of a clear oily base and globs of the glowy pigment. if the formula could stay cohesive, I would actually be inclined to use it more; as it stands, I don't find myself wanting to fuss with mixing it together every time I use it - be aware that the formula does contain some actual micro-glitter particles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really impressed with this new sunscreen complimentary from Cay Skin! It goes on a very light color and blends out instantly on my skin. It's not too greasy or dry which I really like! I think this makes for a nice sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new fave face sunscreen. The formula feels nice on my face and doesn’t feel too heavy. The tint adds such a nice natural glow with no whitecast. Applying it into my face took little effort and was very fast.  Gifted by Cay Skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: I’ve absolutely loved using this product and have been recommending it to all of my friends! It applies so evenly and has a slight tint to make me look more lively and feel more confident! It’s also amazing SPF quality and protects my skin so well  gifted by Cay Skin

This product was SO light and glowy. At first, I wanted to see the difference, so I put the product on one side of my face and compared- the difference was astonishing! One side looked dry while the one with product looked glowy and hydrated almost like a post beach day. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Cay Skin Isle Glow Face Lotion is absolutely AMAZING! This was gifted by Cay Skin and I have nothing but good things to say about it! I literally apply this product under my makeup or just use it alone! It applies so smoothly and has a great scent. The scent is very faint so it is not overpowering at all. You can’t even tell that you are wearing sunscreen. It did not irritate or breakout my skin whatsoever. I would HIGHLY recommend this to anyone looking for a daily sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes your skin glow! It doesn’t have the typical sunscreen smell or feel which makes it perfect for daily wear. I love that it’s a clean sunscreen with only three ingredients! I love that it’s in a pump for the packaging rather than a tube which makes applying the product so much easier. Absolutely beautiful to give you that glow while also hydrating and keeping your skin protected. This product was complimentary from Clay Skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is ok, it doesn’t irritate my skin or eyes. But I can’t use this sunscreen because it makes me look orange. Definitely not for pale skin, I’d say it would match medium-deep skin tones. Feels ok, but looks ridiculous! Gifted by Cay Skin

reviews.review_title: From T Swift to Sun Kissed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: UGH, I love this product! I'm naturally very fair and always need a sunscreen when out and about. I love that this has a tint to it and can be worn alone, or layered under makeup! Often products with sunscreen can pill under makeup, but that's not the case with this one. The packaging is beautiful, the application is smooth, and the absorption is on point! I was gifted by Cay Skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the products that were sent to me gifted by Cay Skin. The lip balm is extremely moisturizing and has a great formula that isn’t stick and leaves your lips looking amazing. I also got 2 SPF protectors. One is tinted and great for a day at the pool with no makeup and the other is great for everyday use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Cay Skin. I was so excited to try this brand for the first time. Being a sunscreen snob, I couldn't wait to get my hands on this Isle Glow Face Lotion. Let me tell you I'm in love with this spf lotion!!! It's absolutely amazing. The texture is creamy and quickly absorbs into my skin. It blends into my skin beautifully and doesn't feel greasy at all. It leaves my face with a sun kissed glow and makes my skin look radiant and healthy. It gives me the protection my skin needs everyday from uv rays and blue light, and makes my skin look and feel incredible. Plus it's super hydrating. It's perfect for my no makeup days. This one will definitely be in my collection from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Texture is light and gentle! I feel how my skin is grateful for this complimentary from Cay Skin! Now I’m confident about my face protection! Smell is so amazing! You should try if you’re looking for something special for summertime!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this spf as a gift complimentary from Cay Skin. When I first applied this spf I didn’t understand what they meant by pearlescent. It wasn’t until I looked at my hand that I understood! It really is like the shimmer of a pearl! When I put it on I was worried that it was actually tinted and I hadn’t seen it, but it wasn’t! It all sunk into my skin, it wasn’t tacky, and was overall extremely pleasant. The smell of sunscreen was barely there. No white cast - amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a good SPF product. The texture is light and applies like a serum or lotion- and it looks very glowy. My skin is oily but this is nice under makeup and powder. I really like that it is reef safe, vegan, and cruelty free. Gifted by Cay Skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: here I write my experience separately about this set  Universal Mineral Face Lotion SPF 55 is the perfect one for summer days out. It gives my skin a natural finish no white cast. It is reef safe and silicone free. It is made of plant based ingredients. While I applied this sunscreen it gives an instant moisture and natural glow. I apply this 15 minutes before sun exposure. For seamless blend I rub it on my skin for about 30 seconds.   Isle Glow Face Lotion SPF 45 is a lightweight antioxidants that protect UVA/UVB. This can be use for all skin tones. It’s nude pearl blend gives my skin a natural look, blends easily and no white cast. After I apply my skin looks very healthy and moisturizer for the rest of the day. It also contains of Vitamin B3 and B5 which is very good for skin. I can wear it with or without makeup.   Overall my experience from these two SPFs, my skin looks very healthy, fresh and smooth after I apply white cast at all.I recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products complimentary from Cay Skin. liked the fact that the Universal Mineral Face Lotion SPF 55 was a yellow tint, and I was expecting that to mean it would leave less of a white cast on the skin. I was mistaken, and unfortunately, the cast is quite noticeable. It did begin to lessen, and eventually disappear after about an hour. TBH, I would use this more as a sunscreen vs a face lotion. The Isle Glow Face Lotion SPF 45 has a beautiful glitter, and I will most likely use this on days I wear makeup, because the white cast and the glitter is too much for me, with nothing else on top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I tell you this will be my summertime staple face moisturizer! This Cay Skin Isle Glow Lotion SPF 45 is amazing! It was gifted by Cay Skin. You literally need no make up , Just jump up and put on this face lotion and you’ll have this beautiful Beyoncé glow. Doesn’t have a heavy fragrance glides on real smoothly not oily at all so it’s great for all skin types. So if you’re looking for a healthy glow that as protection please try this Cay Skin Isle Glow Face Lotion SPF 45.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this sunscreen gifted by Cay Skin. It’s light and easy to blend into my skin. It gives my face a gorgeous glow and my skin looks and feels hydrated. This sunscreen leaves no cast and is very gentle on my skin. I like that you can wear it with or without makeup as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really really loved the finish of this! It felt amazing on my skin and looked beautiful. However, it broke me out and I am super bummed out about that. I can’t tell if it’s the mixture of the product with powder… I will continue to see if I can wear it in a way that won’t break me out because it is beautiful. gifted by Cay Skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This set is absolutely amazing. The lip balm tastes so good and feels like lip gloss but now sticky. The glow sunscreen is tinted so it adds a nice glow to my skin, and has a soft texture that works well with my makeup! Gifted by Cay Skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Cay Skin-- I really have loved using this product, and it absolutely surprised me. It gave a nice base coat for my everyday makeup! It didn't leave a white cast, and it didn't pill below my makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My first impressions of Cay Skin's packaging was minimal, modern but classy. The product comes in a beautiful neutral brown pump bottle. Cay Skin's Isle Glow Face Lotion SPF 45 had a gorgeous application on the skin, it felt like lotion and sunscreen mixed but didn't have a white cast or feel like heavy sunscreen. I have dry & sensitive skin so I would wear this as a base for sun exposure days under makeup. I got this gifted by Cay Skin but I would use this product weekly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product gifted by Cay Skin gives me the best glow! I look like I just got done doing yoga and look refreshed and healthy. I love the higher SPF and it blends out without pilling. The pump is a little different from other sunscreens, but I like it so far

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Isle Glow Face Lotion SPF 45 complimentary from Cay Skin. This is a chemical sunscreen that has a peachy tint and leaves a dewy finish. Despite my skin having a yellow undertone, the color blends seamlessly and effortlessly. My personal preference is to go with a natural finish sunscreen, so I do have to set it with a powder. But overall, it's a pretty good sunscreen if you like one with a glowy finish. I will be using it more during the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This also gifted by the Cay Skin and I have nothing but love for this one too. It gives beautiful dewy glow without white cast. Applies smoothly, no pilling, didn’t make eyes watery, didn’t feel heavy on the skin at all. Definitely a winner and yes I would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Cay Skin: I was so excited when I received this spf from cat skin and let me tell you how much I love it! I like spf with full Coverage no white caste and this thing delivered exactly that. I also like how it was easy to blend and lasted me throughout the day. I touched up my sunscreen maybe 2x in three hours and even then I feel as if it didn’t budge and worked amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much!! I used it as a primer and my makeup looked soo good, so glowy and the best thing is that it has SPF, so you don't have to worry about protecting your face from the sun lol! Highly recommend it    **Complimentary from Cay Skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The glow this lotion leaves on your skin omg....honestly it gave me the confidence to go without makeup. I used about 3 pumps for my entire face which was a perfect amount for my dry skin. Overall, I love and highly recommend it! This was gifted by Cay Skin but my own review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with the isle glow sunscreen. Perfect for summer as a nice tinted moisturizer with SPF to acheive the perfect no makeup look. Will be using all summer long! A little goes a long way and applies very nicely! Gifted by Cay Skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved that this has a natural dewy glow to it. It was super lightweight and didn't have to strong of a scent but it was distinct. My makeup layered over really well! I would def recommend. Gifted by cay

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: #ComplimentaryfromCaySkin These products are incredible. My skin feels super hydrated and protected with The Universal Mineral Face Lotion SPF 55 and The Isle Glow Face Lotion SPF 45. Cay Skin kindly provided me with a bonus product which is the Isle Lip Balm SPF 30. (Another big hit!!) Put simply, their lip balm feels like paradise for my lips.   The Isle Glow Face Lotion SPF 45 has a really hydrating consistency, it melts right into your skin like butter.  The Universal Mineral Face Lotion SPF 55 is a super lightweight cream consistency which covers your face gently like a cream cloud. This reminds me of a liquid highlighter because it’s super rich and sheer. This will go perfectly under makeup or by itself during summertime.  The Isle Lip Balm SPF 30 is an amazing clear lip balm that comes in a beautiful tube and looks a lot like a lipgloss. The scent caught my attention because it smelled wonderfully like coco butter. This is an instant favorite for me.

reviews.review_title: Doesn't Leave a White Cast on Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Cay skin. This product goes on smoothly and blends into my skin really well. It does have a strong smell that lasts on the skin for a while. Aside from that, it does not leave a cast on the skin and I would suggest it for people with darker skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Isle Glow Face Lotion was a product that exceeded my expectations. The texture is gorgeous and has a beautiful tint to it, nearly looking like foundation when you pump it out of the bottle. It felt so smooth on my skin and was more of a luxury experience compared to applying “regular” sunscreen while still getting a whopping SPF 45. The bottle is so chic and aesthetic and looks great on my counter. I look forward to using it now and all summer long when looking for a lightweight SPF product. I received this product complimentary from Cay Skin but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_title: The standout SPF from the brand!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Cay Skin in exchange for my honest review. After testing this for a few days I’m happy to say that I really enjoyed this SPF! It gives a beautiful glow to the skin that looks great underneath makeup! I’ve also worn this on it’s own with a little bit of powder to bring down the glow and have loved the way that looks as well! Overall this is definitely the winning product from the brand for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

After every application my skin has held a beautiful glow, i also have been using this under my makeup and it works pretty good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this! It was a good product. The tint made my friend orange but I didn’t experience this. Overall I like this and think it was fun to try out a new brand and get to see what else is on the market!  Gifted by cat skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

The consistency of the product is amazing and when on it did not feel sticky like most face sunscreens do. This product was gifted to me by Cay Skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

Plus it’s great that it is SPF 45. Really really liked this one and will be restocking when I run out!  Gifted by Cay Skin

I like to use this one on area where I want extra “glow” and use the Cay mineral spf 55 on the rest of my face. This was gifted by Cay skin but when it runs out i will definitely be buying more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: I was gifted by cay skin and This product is so nice! It left my skin feeling dewy and refreshed. It had such a natural glow. I can’t wait to see what other products this brand releases these two are great! It didn’t leave any cast in my skin either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Isle Glow Face Lotion SPF 45, and I've been loving it! It's really light weight, easy to apply on to the skin and doesn't leave a greasy residue. It's also moisturizing so it doesn't dry out the skin and it gives such a nice and natural glow to your skin. The product was gifted by Cay Skin.
